extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Un autel avec une fente ronde au milieu. Insérer une \c[3]\v[item.622.name]\c[0] ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oui

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Inspecter

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: An altar with a round slit in the middle. Insert a \c[3]\v[item.622.name]\c[0]?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Un autel avec une fente ronde au milieu. Insérer une \c[3]\v[item.622.name]\c[0] ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Yes
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oui

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: No
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Non

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: An altar with a round slit in the middle. Could fit a coin.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Un autel avec une fente ronde au milieu. On pourrait y mettre une pièce.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: It's really like I always imagined the perfect vacation would be.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: C'est exactement comme ça que j'imaginais les vacances de mes rêves.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Minus the flying fish monsters.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Sans les monstres poissons volants.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: I just wish swimming was an option.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je regrette juste qu'on puisse pas nager.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: ...Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: ... Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Well...\. swimming is fun?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Euh...\. parce que nager c'est fun ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \c[2][Swimsuits]\c[0]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: \c[2][Maillots de bain]\c[0]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: What?\. No!\. Come on...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Quoi ?\. Non !\. Allez...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Swimsuit skins have been around since forever.\.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Les skins maillots de bain sont déjà dispo depuis toujours.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Of course there are!\. It's easy money.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bien-sûr qu'il y en a !\. C'est de l'argent facile.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: It's just that we Evotars can't access them.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: C'est juste que nous les Évotars peuvent pas y accéder.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Why?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Pourquoi ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Yeah, it's not fair...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oui, c'est pas juste...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \c[2][Double Standard!]\c[0]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: \c[2][Deux poids deux mesures !]\c[0]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Right?!\. Time to fight for our rights to cosmetics!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: N'est-ce pas ?!\. Il est temps de défendre nos droits aux cosmétiques !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: What a peculiar shape in the middle of the sea!\. It looks like the Ancients have something planned for us!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Quel symbole remarquable au milieu de la mer !\. On dirait que les Anciens ont quelque chose de prévu pour nous !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Oui...\. and for once you \c[3]actually\c[0] don't know what this is about and don't just act like it. Non?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oui...\. et pour une fois tu ne sais \c[3]vraiment\c[0] pas de quoi il s'agit en faisant semblant de le savoir. Non ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Surely, if that's what you want to believe, Pentafist!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bien-sûr, si c'est ce que tu veux croire, Pentafist !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: True.\. And finally we both can find out what it's about at the same time.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: C'est vrai.\. Et enfin on va pouvoir tous les deux le découvrir en même temps.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Oui, I really feel like smashing a few things now.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oui, j'ai vraiment envie de frapper quelque chose là.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Surely it can't be much longer!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ça ne doit pas être encore très long !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: I think we're getting close.\. We're not that far from where we started.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je crois qu'on se rapproche.\. On est pas si loin de là où on a commencé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Finally decent ground to stand on...\. somewhat.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Enfin de la terre ferme... Enfin, un peu...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: I think we really went full circle...\. almost.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je crois qu'on a vraiment fait le tour complet...\. presque.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Aaaaand further back.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Eeeet on reviens plus loin en arrière.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: By the Ancients...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Par les anciens...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Please...\. let it end.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Allez, quoi...\. Finissez-le ce chemin...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Linde
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Good, I will mark the first spot I have to investigate!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bien, je vais marquer le premier endroit que j'ai besoin d'étudier !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Linde
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: All set, we can start now!\. And please protect me from angry critters, okay?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Tout est prêt, on peut commencer !\. Et s'il vous plait, protégez-moi de tout ce qui vient, OK ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Alright, let's do this!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bon, c'est parti !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \c[3]Protect Linde\c[0] while she inspects the area
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: \c[3]Protégez Linde\c[0] pendant qu'elle inspecte la région

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[tmp.questEscort-pointText]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [Escortez Linde jusqu'ici]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Escortee Life
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: HP Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Energy
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Énergie

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Linde
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Yep, yep, awesome! \v[lore.title.seeker], this is the spot!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ouaip, ouaip, génial ! \v[lore.title.seeker], voilà l'endroit !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Now we will need to cause some ruckus for those salt-bearing critters to appear.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Maintenant il faut juste mettre un peu de désordre pour que ces bestioles pleines de sel apparaissent.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: I will get everything prepared for that.\. Just talk to me again when you want to wrap this up.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je vais tout préparer pour ça.\. Viens me reparler lorsque tu voudras terminer ça.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Careful, I hear something!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Attention, j'entends quelque chose !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Starting the investigation!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: L'investigation commence !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[tmp.questEscort-inspectText]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [Inspection]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[tmp.questEscort-pointText]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [Escortez Linde jusqu'ici]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Alrighty!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: OK !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Meet?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Rencontrer ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Oh, no, it's not here. But one less place to search, yay!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ah non, c'est pas là. Mais c'est un endroit de moins à chercher, youhou !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Getting dizzy...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je suis un peu vaseuse...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Don't want to stress you, but this is getting a bit painful...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je veux pas vous stresser, mais ça commence à me faire mal...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Ouchie... seems like they really are angry.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Aoutch... On dirait qu'ils sont vraiment en colère.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text:
\c[1]QUÊTE ÉCHOUÉE\c[0]

Redémarrez la quête pour réessayer.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Linde
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Linde
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Ahh, \v[lore.title.seeker], great to see you again!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ahh, \v[lore.title.seeker], ravie de vous revoir !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Hi!\. Meet!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Salut !\. Rencontrer !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Yeah, we can work together again.\. And look at you, even more impressive and shiny than last time!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oui, on peut retravailler ensemble.\. Et regardez-vous, vous êtes encore plus impressionnante que la dernière fois !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Can't brag that much about myself, but I tried my best. l pull my weight with the Gardeners.\. We'll be a great team!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je peux pas en dire autant pour moi. J'ai essayé du mieux que je peux pour me maintenir chez les Jardiniers.\. On va former une belle équipe !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: How?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Comment ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Oh, I will search for an ideal position to harvest the salt by checking energy concentrations around the area.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oh, je vais chercher un endroit idéal pour récolter le sel en vérifiant la concentration d'énergie dans la zone.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: It'll be the same for you as last time.\. Just hold off the angry critters that want to bite off a piece of me, ha...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Pour vous ça sera pareil que la dernière fois.\. Il faut juste empêcher les méchantes créatures de me mettre en morceau...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: No, but seriously, please do.\. The wildlife here is scary, I tell ya.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Non mais sérieusement, s'il vous plait, faites-le.\. La faune ici est effrayante, je vous l'assure.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Anyway, I gotta prepare myself.\. Talk to me again when you are ready to go!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: En tout cas, il faut que je me prépare.\. Revenez me parler lorsque vous serez prête à y aller !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Linde
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Hey there, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Are you ready to escort me around?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Êtes-vous prête pour m'escorter ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Alright.\. Just let me prepare myself real quick.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bon.\. Je vais juste me préparer rapidement.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [shakes head]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [secoue la tête]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Aw, alright.\. I will wait for you here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oh, OK.\. Je vais vous attendre ici.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Linde
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Hey there, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Can we extract that precious salt now?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Est-ce qu'on peut extraire ce précieux sel maintenant ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Awesome!\. I will stir up the water a bit to lure out the blobs!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Fantastique !\. Je vais troubler l'eau pour débusquer les blobs !
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.note: can't find a good translation for herauslocken

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Linde
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Look, \v[lore.title.seeker], there they are in all their squishy, salty beauty!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Regardez, \v[lore.title.seeker], les voilà dans toute leur splendeur salée et molle !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Now you need to \c[3]weaken\c[0] and then \c[3]pacify them with the Wave element\c[0], so I can properly absorb them!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Maintenant vous devez les \c[3]affaiblir\c[0] et les \c[3]apaiser avec l'élément Onde\c[0] pour que je puisse bien les absorber !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Capturing
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Capture

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Escortee Life
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: HP Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Energy
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Énergie

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Collected Salt
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Sel Collecté

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [shakes head]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [secoue la tête]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Okay, I will wait until you're ready.\. But don't take too long, the energy feels very volatile here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: OK, je vais attendre jusqu'à que vous soyez prête.\. Mais ne prenez pas trop de temps, l'énergie ici semble assez volatile.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: There's more of those beach critters!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: D'autres de ces créatures des plages arrivent !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Checking another spot...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je vérifie un autre endroit...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[tmp.questEscort-inspectText]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [Inspection]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[tmp.questEscort-pointText]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [Escortez Linde jusqu'ici]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Good job so far!\. We're definitely getting closer!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bon travail pour l'instant !\. On s'en rapproche vraiment !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: More of them... not my type of day at the beach.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Et en voilà d'autre... Ce n'est pas ce que j'imaginais comme journée à la plage.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Gotta do another check.\. I think we're almost there, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Il me faut une autre mesure.\. Je crois qu'on y est presque, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[tmp.questEscort-inspectText]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [Inspection]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[tmp.questEscort-pointText]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [Escortez Linde jusqu'ici]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Still not the spot.\. But it leads to that island back there.\. That MUST be it, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: C'est toujours pas là.\. Mais cela mène à cet îlot là-bas.\. Ça DOIT être ça, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: They really don't want us to reach the spot, eh?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ils ne veulent vraiment pas qu'on atteigne le point, hein ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Yes, picking up a lot of energy already.\. This might be it, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oui, la concentration d'énergie monte déjà en flèche.\. Ça pourrait être ça, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[tmp.questEscort-inspectText]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [Inspection]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Investigation done, this is definitely the place!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Fini l'exploration, c'est certainement le bon endroit !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Just get rid of the remaining enemies and we can begin extracting the salt!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Débarrassez-nous juste des ennemis qui restent et on pourra commencer à extraire le sel !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Woah, it works!\. My back feels hella salty already!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ouah, ça fonctionne !\. Mon dos se sent déjà bien salé !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Or maybe I'm just sweaty...?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ou c'est peut-être juste que je transpire... ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Why...?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Pourquoi... ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: And another one! Just one more and we're done here, \v[lore.title.seeker].
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Et un autre ! Encore un et on aura terminé, \v[lore.title.seeker].

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Yeah! That's all \v[lore.title.seeker], great job!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Yeah ! C'est tout, \v[lore.title.seeker], super boulot !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Now we just \c[3]need to get rid of the rest\c[0], so we can relax and go back!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Maintenant il faut juste \c[3]se débarrasser du reste\c[0] pour qu'on puisse se détendre et rentrer !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], I got one!\. ... still not enough, though.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], j'en ai eu un !\. ... mais ça suffit toujours pas.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: We better wait for more to appear, so we can get enough salt!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Nous devrions attendre que d'autres apparaissent, pour qu'on ait assez de sel !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Aw, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. All of the salty blobs are gone before we got enough salt!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Aw, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Tous ces blobs salés sont partis avant qu'on ait eu assez de sel !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: We better wait for more to appear, so I can fill the tank!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Nous devrions attendre que d'autres apparaissent, pour que je puisse remplir le réservoir !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Linde
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Linde

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Yes!\. We got enough of the precious salt!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Oui !\. Maintenant on a assez de sel précieux !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: This should help HQ to tinker together something that can help against that pesky spirit.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ça devrait aider le QG à bricoler quelque chose pour nous aider à contrer ce satané esprit.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: I just knew that we'd get this done.\. Jungle or beach, you can rely on a \v[lore.title.seeker]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je savais qu'on réussirait ensemble !\. Dans une jungle ou à la plage, on peut compter sur un \v[lore.title.seeker] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: But I gotta hurry back to the HQ so we can get our tools ready.\. I will see you later!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Mais il faut que je me dépêche de retourner au QG, pour qu'on puisse se préparer.\. On se voit plus tard !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Where the heck is that last MacGuffin?\. I swear, I looked everywhere!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Mais il est où ce dernier foutu MacGuffin ?\. Je l'jure, j'ai cherché partout !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Nobody knows!\. Trust me, I asked around.\. A lot.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Personne ne sait !\. Crois-moi, j'ai demandé.\. À tout le monde.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: What do you mean?\. Did no one find it?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Qu'est-ce que tu dis ?\. Personne ne l'a trouvé ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Seems like it.\. Maybe there is no way to get it just yet.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: On dirait, oui.\. Peut-être qu'il n'y a pas moyen de l'avoir maintenant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: I can't believe it...
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: J'y crois pas...

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Don't worry, I'm fine.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, je vais bien.

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: I'm just saying...\. getting hit by a falling coconut is a serious danger!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Je disais juste...\. qu'une noix de coco qui tombe, c'est vraiment dangereux !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Did you forget this is a game?\. What's the worst that can happen?
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: C'est juste un jeu, tu te rappelles ?\. C'est quoi le pire qui peut arriver ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Who knows! It might be a hidden insta-kill field hazard!
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Qui sait ! Ça pourrait être un piège qui tue instantanément !

extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.orig: Yeah right...\. I'll take my chances.
extension/post-game/data/maps/beach/path.text: Ouais bien sûr...\. Moi je vais rester là.
